summary: A man is framed and sent to prison for a crime he didn't commit. When he is let out on limited parole, he sets out to clear his name and find the real criminals.
cast: Robert Kent|Anne Nagel|Sidney Blackmer|Victor Kilian|Norman Willis|Maude Eburne|Ben Alexander|Pat Flaherty|Carleton Young|Howard Hickman|Joan Barclay|Harry Strang|George Cleveland|Lester Dorr|Jane Keckley|Donald Kerr|Frank LaRue|Maxine Leslie|Lafe McKee|Dennis Moore|Hal Price|Kathryn Sheldon|Carol Tevis
title: Convict's Code
